subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Despite hefty payrolls, the Mets and the Cubs will probably recall 2009 as a season of losing. On Friday, behind starter Bobby Parnell, the Mets managed to win.
snippet: Despite hefty payrolls, the Mets and the Cubs will probably recall 2009 as a season of losing. On Friday, behind starter Bobby Parnell, the Mets managed to win.
